job_tasks.phrase: Helpen bij de transformatie naar een data-driven organisatie
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context and aligning technical solutions with strategic goals of becoming data-driven.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met diverse teams om AI en ML oplossingen af te stemmen op bedrijfsdoelen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand business goals and translate them into AI/ML solutions through collaboration.
This is a direct mention of building predictive models, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Ideeën op het gebied van Machine Learning en GenAI uitwerken en ontwikkelen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions developing ideas in ML and GenAI, indicating core modeling activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyse van datasets om inzichten te krijgen
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing datasets to gain insights is a foundational step in the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van AI- en machine learning-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the broader software development lifecycle for AI/ML solutions, including design, development, and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: optimaliseren van onze interne tools en infrastructuur
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing internal tools and infrastructure implies software development and engineering practices to improve existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: optimaliseren van onze interne tools en infrastructuur
job_tasks.justification: While also software development, 'optimizing infrastructure' can lean into MLOps if it involves the operational aspects of AI/ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Onderzoeken van nieuwe technologieen en trends
job_tasks.justification: This relates to staying current with operational aspects and technologies relevant to AI/ML deployment and maintenance.

soft_skills.phrase: innovatieve projecten die de kern vormen van onze organisatie
vrijheid om je creativiteit en technische vaardigheden in te zetten
Onderzoeken van nieuwe technologieen en trends

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building predictive models and analyzing datasets for insights, aligning with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer. While GenAI is mentioned, the focus is on broader AI/ML solutions and optimizing internal processes, rather than solely on generative model applications or advanced LLM techniques.
